summary: This bill, the Medicare and Medicaid Dental, Vision, and Hearing Benefit Act of 2025, amends Titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide coverage for dental, vision, and hearing services under Medicare and Medicaid. It defines covered services, sets payment amounts with a phased-in approach, and outlines limitations and secretarial authority. The bill also includes changes to durable medical equipment definitions and repeals exclusion grounds. Medicaid receives increased federal medical assistance percentage for these new services.
